page.title: 13PLOCKTON XMAS PARTY.
page.content: EACH YEAR DURING THE LAST WEEK OF TERM IN DECEMBER,THE XMAS PARTY IS HELD IN{PLOCKTON VILLAGE HALL.}THE HALL IS DECORATED AND THERE IS A TREE ON THE STAGE.THE PARTY IS FOR THE PRIMARY SCHOOL PUPILS AND TODDLERS. LOTS OF THE VILLAGERS COME TO HELP AND WATCH. AT THE START THERE IS A{BIG FEAST}OF SANDWICHES,CAKES,DRINKS,JELLY AND ICE CREAM. THEN THE HALL IS CLEARED OF FURNITURE SO THAT THE{GAMES}AND{DANCES}CAN GO ON.AFTER ABOUT 2 HOURS,THE LIGHTS GO DIM,BELLS TINKLE OUTSIDE AND{SANTA {CLAUS}WALKS IN.WE SING FOR HIM AND HE ALWAYS HAS A PRESENT FOR EVERYONE. THEN WE THANK ALL THE PEOPLE WHO ORGANISED THE PARTY AND LEAVE THE HALL READY FOR THE{DISCO}FOR THE OLDER CHILDREN WHICH IS HELD IN THE EVENING.
